name: WorkItems-Service-Cloud-Integration-Lab
description: Salesforce SFDX project with LWC, Apex, and custom metadata

sharing_model.description: Every Apex class with SOQL/DML must have 'with sharing', 'without sharing', or 'inherited sharing'

crud_validation.description: Validate CRUD permissions before any SOQL/DML operation

debug_statements.description: Avoid System.debug() in production code. Use logging framework instead.

soql_centralization.description: Keep all SOQL/DML in dedicated, testable methods
soql_centralization.benefit: Easy to mock, single point of maintenance

test_visible.description: Mark test-only methods and members with @TestVisible
test_visible.reason: Ensures test isolation without exposing in production

safe_fallbacks.description: Provide safe default values when configuration/data is missing
safe_fallbacks.benefit: App never crashes due to missing config

javadoc_description.description: Add @description tag to every method JavaDoc

caching.description: Cache expensive operations (metadata queries, describe results)

trailing_whitespace.description: Remove trailing spaces at end of lines

describe_options.impact: Improves performance by avoiding eager loading of child relationships
